title: What Graves' new splash art will look like

replies.body:
Not only will he kill HIS lungs, but now YOUR'S Too!

Muahahahahahahaha!
Maybe his jungle clears won't be as healthy too!

One can only hope.

He'll have an all-natural smoke-screen, if nothing else.

> [{quoted}](name=EbonyBladeJ88,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pUky9TUA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-04T00:03:14.208+0000)
>
> Not only will he kill HIS lungs, but now YOUR'S Too!
> 
> Muahahahahahahaha!

{{champion:104}} _invades_ {{champion:11}} 

{{champion:11}} : I am too weak after fighting the Raptors. I cannot fight you Graves.
{{champion:104}} : Hope you weren't planning to die of natural causes.
{{champion:104}} _blasts_ {{champion:11}} 
{{champion:11}} _starts to hack_
{{champion:11}} : Augh what was that? _cough cough_ Do you have a new gun?
{{champion:104}} : Yes, and you have lung cancer now.
{{champion:11}} : Nooooo! You have made my worst fears a reality! I have no gold to pay for the chemotherapy! I am doomed to die a slow death!
{{champion:104}} : End of the line. Night night, Yi.
{{champion:11}} : Graves you bastard... _starts sobbing_
**A Summoner has disconnected.**
and then yi meditates and is k.
Yi meditates and becomes half immortal. Since meditating can somehow increase life span?
you see he really thinks about it and decides that he wasn't really as injured as he thought he was.
Can you qss cancer?
*Zed slowly nods "no"*
Only if it's considered Crowd Control.

Death is the ultimate Crowd Control.

Just ask {{champion:27}}

But you can't QSS Zed's ult anymore.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/231/999/ba5.jpg
It has mutated
Blasted radiation.
Yasuo had powers to spread cancer before it was meta.
You spelled "Vayne" wrong.
{{item:3751}} {{summoner:11}}
Thanks for crediting :)

Fake, it's totally photoshopped.

I expected better from the splash art team, CandleJim. I expected far better. Tsk, tsk, tsk.
CandleJim is now my dark, meme side. Domo oregano.
Whatever, Mr. Rugratto.
Upvoted for CandleJim.
We can expect to see "Cuban Graves" (1350 RP) to appear shortly now, can't we?

No problem :)

point? just cuz you don't like it doesn't mean others shouldn't

Personally, I think Graves has been a closet-smoker since he ever turned jungler. Because didn't he turn jungler shortly after losing his cigar?
And whenever you find him in there, and he moves, there is suddenly this cloud of smoke appearing. 

I'm certain he's been smoking cigars in the nearest bush whenever the opportunity has presented itself!
